sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section>
    <form>
      <input
        name="busca"
        id="busca"
        type="text"
        placeholder="Buscar..."
        v-model="busca"
      />
      <input
        type="submit"
        id="lupa"
        value="Buscar"
        @click.prevent="buscarProdutos(busca)"
      />
    </form>
  </section>
</template>

<script>
import { api } from "@/services.js";

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      busca: "",
    };
  },
  methods: {
    buscarProdutos() {
      this.$router.push({ query: { q: this.busca } });
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
form {
  max-width: 600px;
  margin: 30px auto 60px auto;
  position: relative;
}
#busca {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 20px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 4px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(30, 60, 90, 0.3);
  transition: all 0.3s;
}

#busca:focus,
#busca:hover {
  outline: none;
  transform: scale(1.1);
}

#lupa {
  width: 62px;
  height: 62px;
  background: url("../assets/search.svg") no-repeat center center;
  text-indent: -150px;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0px;
  right: 0px;
  box-shadow: none;
}
</style>
